title: I LOVE the new SR changes!
body:
ALL the games i've played recently have been really exciting! I can attribute most of the excitement to the new features. As a jungler, I can FEEL the gameplay diversity and the heightened ferocity. Defending when the other team is ahead FEELS more hopeful. Controlling dragon FEELS more impactful. Everything FEELS more meaningful!

This is something I never knew I always wanted. THANKS RIOT!

replies.body:
i hated it to start with, not bad now once the eyes get used to it. There is a few things that need to be fixed though-

1- minion block is strong on this new map
2- alot of places where you get stuck on walls and just stop walking ( when you click to go across the map and let your champ walk over)
i hate jg now. its actually cancer besides ww and wukon
